name: Paint Glider
description:
This game was created by Bayden Woodland-Bird and Seb Woodland.

We created the game in twelve hours (over two days), during a personal game jam. We had a weird randomized prompt, which might explain why this game is the way it is.

Bayden programmed the whole thing.

(with some input from Seb)

Seb created the music, graphics, and sound effects.

(with some input from Bayden.)

We both came up with the weird ideas together.

Story

You are JAMES GRAW.

Every night when you dream, you enter into a strange world. In this world, you find yourself with a (catapult-enhanced) HANG GLIDER. An army of EVIL TANKS are set on destroying the dream, but you alone can stop them, using the MAGIC PAINT BUCKETS.

Try to destroy as many tanks as you can before you fall. And if you run out of paint buckets, watch for them falling from the sky.

Controls

A - Turn counter-clockwise

D - Turn clockwise

W - Boost

S - Shoot Bucket

Space - Let go

Backspace - Restart

Escape - Quit

...Leave a comment with your high score if you want!
